name: express-starter
description: This repository will be used to simply not have to waste time on setting up a new Express project. It has the essentials packages (at least essential for me) with a few folder setups that I usually like to have.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" " cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-modules: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd .. && cd client && npm i
scripts.build-full: cd server && npm run build && cd.. && cd client && npm run build

author: Omar Hammoud
